text: Tankersley F.C. was an English association football club based in Tankersley, Barnsley, South Yorkshire. ==History== The club was formed around 1910, and competed in the Barnsley Association League right through to its winding up in 1923. They also entered the FA Cup on numerous occasions.Sheffield Independent, 2 January 1915, page 9Sheffield Daily Telegraph, 12 June 1913, page 3 ==Honours== *Barnsley Association League **Champions - 1913/14 ==Records== *Best FA Cup performance: 1st Qualifying Round, 1912–13, 1919–20 ==References== Category:Defunct football clubs in South Yorkshire Category:Barnsley Association League Category:Association football clubs disestablished in 1923
title: Tankersley F.C.
